info.title: VAT API v1
info.description: API for VAT UID validation, state retrieval, history, and search.

get.description: Returns the company information for the authenticated user

post.description: Authenticates the user and returns an access token.
Deletes the existing token and generates a new one.
Register a new user with optional company information

get.description: Returns the current status of two-factor authentication for the authenticated user.

post.description: Enables two-factor authentication for the authenticated user.

qr_code.description: QR code SVG for Google Authenticator

delete.description: Disables two-factor authentication for the authenticated user.

post.description: Confirms two-factor authentication for the authenticated user.
Generates new recovery codes for the authenticated user.
Checks if a VAT UID is valid.

company_name.description: The company name to validate against the VAT UID

provider.description: The VAT provider to use for validation. Possible values: 'fon' (Fon), 'vies' (Vies), 'uk_hmrc' (UK HMRC), 'ai_search' (AI Search), 'fon_vies_ai_search' (Fon + Vies + AI Search), 'uk_hmrc_ai_search' (UK HMRC + AI Search), 'fon_ai_search' (Fon + AI Search), 'fon_vies' (Fon + Vies), 'vies_ai_search' (Vies + AI Search). Default is null.

post.description: Checks if multiple VAT UIDs are valid and returns their validation status.

vat_uids.description: An array of VAT UIDs to validate

company_names.description: An optional array of company names to validate against the VAT UIDs (order should match vat_uids array)

provider.description: The VAT provider to use for validation. Possible values: 'fon' (Fon), 'vies' (Vies), 'uk_hmrc' (UK HMRC), 'ai_search' (AI Search), 'fon_vies_ai_search' (Fon + Vies + AI Search), 'uk_hmrc_ai_search' (UK HMRC + AI Search), 'fon_ai_search' (Fon + AI Search), 'fon_vies' (Fon + Vies), 'vies_ai_search' (Vies + AI Search). Default is null.

post.description: Validates if the given VAT UID follows the correct format and schema based on country-specific VAT rules.

vat_uid.description: The VAT UID to be validated

valid.description: Indicates whether the VAT UID is valid

error.example: Invalid format: A VAT UID must start with two uppercase letters.

post.summary: Get the state of a VAT UID
post.description: Retrieves the current state of a VAT UID.
Retrieves the history of a VAT UID.

parameters.name: vat_uid
parameters.description: VAT UID to retrieve history for (optional)

post.description: Find VAT records based on search filters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter VAT records

post.description: Generates a downloadable PDF certificate for a validated VAT ID based on the provided UUID. The certificate language defaults to English if not specified.

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the VAT validation request.

lang.description: (Optional) Language for the generated PDF certificate. Allowed values: 'en' (English), 'de' (German). Defaults to 'en' if not provided.

items.example: The selected language is invalid. Allowed values: 'en', 'de'.

post.summary: Initiate Bulk Export of VAT Certificates
post.description: Initiates an asynchronous process to export multiple VAT certificates for a company within a date range. The process generates a ZIP file containing all certificates and sends an email with a download link when complete.

from_date.description: Start date for the export range (YYYY-MM-DD)

to_date.description: End date for the export range (YYYY-MM-DD)

countries.description: Optional array of country codes to filter by (e.g. ['DE', 'AT'])

lang.description: Optional language for the certificates. Allowed values: 'en' (English), 'de' (German). Defaults to 'en' if not provided.

message.example: VAT certificates export initiated. You will receive an email with a download link when the export is complete.

export_id.description: Unique identifier for the export job

items.example: The from date field is required.
The to date field is required.
The selected language is invalid. Allowed values: 'en', 'de'.

get.description: Downloads a ZIP file containing VAT certificates that were previously exported. The export must belong to the company of the authenticated user.

parameters.name: exportId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the export job

message.example: Export job does not belong to the company

VatResource.title: VAT Resource
VatResource.description: Response structure for a VAT request

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the VAT record

state.description: State of the VAT number (e.g., VALID, INVALID, NOT_FOUND)

country_code.description: Country code of the VAT registration

company_name.description: Registered company name for the VAT number

requested_company_name.description: The company name that was provided during the VAT validation request

checked_at.description: Timestamp of the last VAT check

score.description: Risk Score! 100 OK, 50 Could be fraud...

breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the score calculation

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key required for all requests. Provide the key via the x-api-key header.
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key

bearerAuth.description: JWT access token returned by /api/v1/login. Use as Authorization: Bearer <token>.
